events.comment:
Variables;
setText.defaults = sets the default variables

    Position;
        textEntry: 
textEntry.x = x position of textEntry, 
textEntry.y = y position of textEntry

        text: 
textText.x = x position of text, 
textText.y = y position of text,
textText.z = z position of text,
textText.quanity = amount of text fields to create
textText.message = message. If this string is empty the defaults variables will load
textText.message2 = optional second messsage that displays after the text object is clicked or touched

        text2: 
text2Text.create = create second text box
text2Text.x = x position of text2, 
text2Text.y = y position of text2,
text2Text.z = z position of text2,
text2Text.message = message

        tiledLineObject: 
tiledLineObject.x, 
tiledLineObject.y,
tiledLineObject.w = width of tiledLineObject, 
tiledLineObject.lineAnimation = Animation for tileLineObject

Usage;

        <DirectedTextVariable> = <int value>
